input.sentences: i decided to check out our local library .
it is an old building with a lot of books .
they have a hiking trail as well .
i stopped to smell the flowers .
it was a fun time and this is the back of the building .
output.sentences: There once was a beautiful castle on the green hills.
Many walked to the castle and around the grounds.
People took pictures of the castle and themselves on the grounds.
A picture of t he back of the castle also showed what it had looked like long ago.
